title: How to Use the Air Conditioner's Remote Controller
content:
How to set Current Time (If necessary)

Before running the unit, you may need to configure the current day and time.

  • Press the Timer button for 2 seconds or more until the timer display flashes.
  • Use the « » or « » buttons to set the date. Confirm the date setting by pressing the Timer button or Confirm button.
  • Use the « » or « » buttons to adjust the current time in 1-minute increments (hold to adjust continuously).
  • Press the Confirm button to finalize the time setting.
  • (Optional) To switch between 12-hour and 24-hour display, press the « » and « » buttons together for 2 seconds.

Step-by-Step Guide to Heating Operation

Step 1: Start Operation

  • Press the Power button (Botón de Encendido) to start or stop the operation of the air conditioning unit.

Step 2: Select the Heating Mode

  • Press the Mode button (Botón MODO) to cycle through and select the desired operating mode.
  • Select the "Calor" (Heat) mode.
    • Note: The heating mode is not available for cooling-only units.

Step 3: Adjust the Temperature

  • Press the « » (Up) or « » (Down) buttons to adjust the ambient temperature.
  • The typical indoor temperature range that can be set is 10/16/17 ~ 30 °C or 20 ~ 28 °C (depending on the specific model).
    • (Optional) In some models, you can switch the temperature display scale (°C) by pressing the « » or « » buttons together for 3 seconds.

Step 4: Adjust Fan Speed (Optional)

  • Press the Fan Speed button (Botón VELOCIDAD DEL VENTILADOR) to adjust the fan speed.
  • Cycle through Auto, low, medium, or high speed.
    • Note: This button is not available when the unit is in Auto or Dry modes

Step-by-Step Guide to Cooling Operation

Step 1: Start Operation

  • Press the Power button (Botón de Encendido) to initiate the operation of the air conditioning unit.

Step 2: Select the Cooling Mode

  • Press the Mode button (Botón MODO) repeatedly to cycle through the operating modes.
  • Select the "Frío" (Cool) mode.
    • Note: Available modes include Auto, Frío (Cool), Seco (Dry), Calor (Heat), and Ventilador (Fan).

Step 3: Adjust the Temperature Setting

  • Press the « » (Up) or « » (Down) buttons to adjust the ambient temperature.
  • The adjustable indoor temperature range is typically 10/16/17 ~ 30 °C or 20 ~ 28 °C, depending on the model.
    • (Optional) In some models, you can switch the temperature display scale (°C) by pressing the « » or « » buttons together for 3 seconds.

Step 4: Adjust Fan Speed (Optional)

  • Press the Fan Speed button (Botón VELOCIDAD DEL VENTILADOR) to adjust the airflow.
  • The fan speed can be cycled through Auto, low, medium, or high speed.
    • Note: The Fan Speed button is not available when the unit is operating in Auto or Dry modes.
